SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.repository

Interface AircraftRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcAircraftRepository
public interface AircraftRepository
Repository interface for aircraft data access operations. Defines methods for performing CRUD operations and specific queries related to aircraft.

    • findAll

      List<AircraftModel> findAll()
      Retrieve all aircraft.
      Returns:
      List of all aircraft

    • findById

      Optional<AircraftModel> findById(Long id)
      Find an aircraft by its database ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The database ID to search for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the aircraft if found, empty Optional otherwise

    • findByRegistrationNumber

      Optional<AircraftModel> findByRegistrationNumber(String registrationNumber)
      Find an aircraft by its registration number.
      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - The registration number to search for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the aircraft if found, empty Optional otherwise

    • findByType

      List<AircraftModel> findByType(AircraftType type)
      Find aircraft by type.
      Parameters:
      type - The aircraft type to search for
      Returns:
      List of aircraft with the specified type

    • findByStatus

      List<AircraftModel> findByStatus(String status)
      Find aircraft by status.
      Parameters:
      status - The aircraft status to search for
      Returns:
      List of aircraft with the specified status

    • findAvailableAircraft

      List<AircraftModel> findAvailableAircraft()
      Find available aircraft (status is AVAILABLE).
      Returns:
      List of available aircraft

    • save

      AircraftModel save(AircraftModel aircraft)
      Save an aircraft to the database. If the aircraft has no ID, it will be inserted as a new record. If it has an ID, the existing record will be updated.
      Parameters:
      aircraft - The aircraft to save
      Returns:
      The saved aircraft with generated ID (for new records)

    • deleteById

      void deleteById(Long id)
      Delete an aircraft by its database ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the aircraft to delete

    • updateStatus

      boolean updateStatus(String registrationNumber, String status, String location)
      Update the status of an aircraft.
      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - The registration number of the aircraft
      status - The new status
      location - The current location (optional)
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • updateMaintenanceDate

      boolean updateMaintenanceDate(String registrationNumber, LocalDateTime maintenanceDate)
      Update the next maintenance date for an aircraft.
      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - The registration number of the aircraft
      maintenanceDate - The date of the next maintenance
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • countByStatus

      int countByStatus(String status)
      Count aircraft by status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to count
      Returns:
      The number of aircraft with the specified status

    • countAll

      int countAll()
      Count all aircraft.
      Returns:
      The total number of aircraft

    • existsByRegistrationNumber

      boolean existsByRegistrationNumber(String registrationNumber)
      Check if an aircraft exists with the given registration number.
      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - The registration number to check
      Returns:
      true if an aircraft exists with the registration number, false otherwise
